org.jconverter.converter

Class TypedConverter<T,U>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jconverter.converter.TypedConverter<T,U>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the source type of the converter.
    U - the target type of the converter.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Converter<T,U>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TypedConverterProxy

    public abstract class TypedConverter<T,U>
extends Object
implements Converter<T,U>
    A converter that explicitly specifies its source and target types.

    sergioc
